forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
